channel.title: Qemu on Sriram S - Innervoice
channel.description: Recent content in Qemu on Sriram S - Innervoice

item.title: KVM and QEMU â€“ do you know the connection?
item.description: If you were to ask someone “what is the most popular open source hypervisor” chances are that the answer will be KVM. Indeed KVM (or Kernel-based Virtual Machine) has played a key role in the open source Linux based virtualization environment. However is it really a hypervisor? Moreover, can KVM by itself run virtual machines? We will delve more into such questions in this blog. We will also understand the relationship between KVM and QEMU (Quick EMUlator).
